All the rooms are fully carpeted and air-conditioned, with attached bathrooms and private balconies. The other features of the rooms are in-room safe deposit boxes, mini refrigerator, selected cable TV channels and IDD telephone. This uptown hotel's main priority is to provide the guests with comfort and luxury.

description: Proposed as a modern structure, this truly distinctive establishment with its comfortable and practical accommodation is capable of meeting the needs of the numerous tourists headed for Singapore as well as an incentive type guests. Summer View Hotel Singapore provides personalized services such as currency exchange, tour desk and tele - fax to its guests. Visitors can enjoy shopping at the famous Suntec City Mall or explore Malay Heritage Center to know more about culture and history of Malay Singaporeans. name: Metropolitan Y
description:
The Metropolitan Y is located at the fringe of Orchard Road shopping belt and the posh district 9 residences. Our hotel is Ideal for visitors seeking a no-frills yet comfortable budget hotel accommodation near Orchard Road, with easy access to the city centre and Chinatown. The nearest MRT is Orchard Station, only 8 minutes away by bustaxi. Complimentary transfers are available, please check with the hotel's reception.Guests will be delighted to enjoy a host of facilities such as our 25m swimming pool, gymnasium, restaurant, launderette, business center and free wireless internet broadband access at our lobby , guest rooms and restaurant area. There is free ample car parking just around the hotel and we offer local tours assistance. Our rooms feature in-room cable television programs that will keep you in touched with the world's events and entertainment.
Directions from Changi Airport:If you are driving:- Exit from Changi Airport by Jurong PIE, Go straight all the way till you reach Stevens Rd Exit (12 hr drive along the PIE), Turn into Stevens Rd Exit and drive pass 2 traffic lights, Metropolitan YMCA is just at your left. If you are taking a taxi:- Inform the cab driver to send you to the YMCA at Stevens Road. If you are taking public transport: - Take MRT and alight at Orchard MRT station, Walk out to Orchard Boulevard bus stop on the same side of the road, Take bus 190. The bus will go into Scotts Road, then Stevens Road. Alight at the fourth stop, opposite the Metropolitan YMCA. Public Transport: Bus services along Stevens Rd - 190, 132, 105Bus services along Whitley Rd - 960, 170, 171, 67, 66MRT: Nearest MRT Newton and Orchard MRT

name: Aliwal Park
description:
Newly renovated on July 2012, Aliwal Park Hotel has transformed from an old tired looking hotel into a new modern city hotel. We offer simple, safe and affordable guest room ranging from a simple standard room to the larger family room where a family of 4 could stay. It has 54 rooms and its ideal for both business and leisure travel. Aliwal Park Hotel is ideally situated in Bugis, just 2 km from the city. Yet, it sits in the middle of a Malay Heritage Center that has a rich history of early Malay living in Singapore. This place offers a great selection of local and international foods with shopping throughout the day. In the night, it transforms itself into a great dinning and entertainment place. Free Wi-Fi in the lobby area or you can choose to pay a small fee to access it in the comfort of your room. All rooms comes with free satellitecable programs in various languages.Close proximity to the subway (MRT) stations allow you to access freely to most major parts of Singapore.
Aliwal Park Hotel is ideally situated in Bugis, just 2 km from the city. Yet, it sits in the middle of a Malay Heritage Center that has a rich history of early Malay living in Singapore. This place offers a great selection of local and international foods with shopping throughout the day. In the night, it transforms itself into a great dinning and entertainment place. Close proximity to the subway (MRT) stations allow you to access freely to most major parts of Singapore. It is also 0.5km from a long distant coach depot where you can travel by coaches to Malaysia and Thailand.

name: Hotel 81 Cosy
description: This hotel is located in the Tanjong Pagar area, surrounded by colonial style, history and architecture. It is just walking distance from Chinatown and next to Pinnacle@Duxton, a showcase of Singapore's world-famous public housing project. The area of Tanjong Pagar is home to many architectural gems. In the vibrant district of Chinatown visitors can explore the history of the early and more recent Chinese immigrants. Attractions in the surrounding area including Raffles Place (about 2.5 km), Sentosa tourist centre (some 5.6 km) and East Coast Park beach (roughly 15 km). Kuala Lumpur is around 368 km away and it is some 23 km to Singapore Airport from the property.This hotel comprises a total of 39 rooms over 5 floors. It features simple and minimalist décor and offers prices tailored to the general traveller. The property provides modern amenities to assure its guests peace of mind and comfort and is ideal for business travellers and holidaymakers alike. Facilities on offer to guests at this air-conditioned establishment include a lobby area with a 24-hour reception and check-out service and a hotel safe.All rooms come with a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer and offer a double bed. They are equipped with a direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV and Internet access. Furthermore, tea and coffee making facilities, an ironing set and air conditioning are provided in all accommodation units as standard.Guests arriving from Changi Airport MRT Station should head for Tanah Merah MRT Station and change to the train travelling towards Joo Koon Station. Get out at Outram Park MRT Station and take Exit H. The hotel is then within walking distance.

name: Equarius Sentosa
description:
Discover a precious pearl at the southernmost tip of continental Asia. Situated along the fringe of a tropical rainforest on Sentosa, the Equarius Hotel ensconces guests in a haven of lush greenery. An integral part of Resorts World Sentosa, the Equarius Hotel is the perfect getaway for nature lovers and families alike and is a stone's throw from nature hikes amidst verdant grounds and the island's numerous attractions, including a water theme park that is opening soon. Guests are accommodated in oversized deluxe rooms and suites, boasting balconies with gracious, panoramic views of either forest or sea, in deference to nature. A full complement of luxurious in-room amenities coupled with round-the-clock room service ensures a peerless stay experience. Guests are assured of a superior slumber on luxe mattresses paired with 400 thread count Egyptian cotton bed linen in all guestrooms, and spacious bathrooms with double vanity areas, tubs and separate showers. Guests staying in suite rooms can also take advantage of customized pillow menus and exclusive 24-hour personal butler service. An exquisite dining experience awaits guests at Forest, a unique dining concept helmed by renowned celebrity chef Sam Leong. Guests dine under a forest canopy inspired ceiling, whilst savoring Chef Leong's signature flavorful creations. Equarius Hotel is also complemented by a full level devoted to meeting and function rooms to suit every purpose. Guests at Equarius Hotel are simply spoilt for choice.
Resorts World Sentosa is a mere 10 minutes from Singapore Central Business District, and is easily accessible via reliable, convenient and extremely affordable modes of transportation i.e. buses, MRT rail system, cabs and cars. One can also take a leisurely stroll from VivoCity shopping mall to the resort.
Deluxe Room - Guests are accommodated in oversized deluxe rooms of at least 65sqm, boasting balconies with coffee tables that overlook panoramic views of either forest or sea, in deference to nature. A large L-shaped settee and multi-directional TV rack ensures optimal comfort for both living and entertaining, while superior slumber is guaranteed on luxe mattresses paired with 400 thread count Egyptian cotton bed linen. Spacious bathrooms boast double vanity areas, large bathtubs with separate rain-shower chambers and a clear screen affording a view of the bedroom, that turns opaque for privacy at the flick of a switch. Equarius Hotel's luxurious in-room amenities coupled with round-the-clock room service ensures every guest a peerless stay experience.Room amenities: Balcony panoramic or forest/sea view, iHome Docking Station, Minibar, Iron & Ironing Board, Kettle with Coffee & Tea Service, 42 Plasma TV with Cable Vision

description:

The hotel is a 10-minute drive from the Orchard Road shopping area and a 25-minute drive from Changi International Airport.Grand C Hotel provides the best value for budget conscious travelers without compromising on the quality of stay with superb location. Located in Kitchener Road, the hotel is in the heart of Little India, a popular tourist attraction where tourists can experience the unique culture, scent and sight of the locality. This charming property has long been a favorite in Singapore for both business and leisure travelers. Surrounded by many of the popular shopping malls and food centers, Grand C Hotel is definitely the choice for stay if the guests' priority is convenience and experience. Staff at Grand C's 24-hour reception can assist in ticketing services to nearby attractions. Tour arrangement is available on request.
Grand C Hotel is just a 5-minute walk from the culturally rich Little India and the 24-hour retail mall Mustafa Centre.Situated in Kitchener Road, the hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Farrer Park MRT Station. name: Supreme
description:
Located just 20 minutes drive away from the Changi International Airport, Supreme Hotel is rated among the best 3 star hotels in Singapore. The hotel is at a walking distance from the famous Orchard Road, offering easy access to major shopping and entertainment centres of Singapore. Whether you're visiting Singapore for business or pleasure, the Supreme Hotel ensures a comfortable stay at the most affordable rate. The glitz and glamour of Singapore's well known Orchard road is just within the walking distance from Supreme hotel. From the smaller shopping outlets to the shopping complexes and from the banks and cinemas to restaurants and nightclubs, all come with a few minutes walk from the 3star hotel in Singapore. Besides location, the accommodation of Supreme Hotel, Singapore is equally good. The hotel boasts a total of 69 well-appointed rooms, further categorised into standard rooms, superior rooms and family rooms. The rooms have been recently updated keeping in mind the modern day necessities of the guests. All guestrooms are well-furnished and are equipped with most of the modern amenities such as air-conditioning, cable TV, IDD telephone, attached baths, room service and many more. Hotel Supreme offers a host of facilities and services to make your stay in Singapore a comfortable and enjoyable affair. The hotel feautres a well-decorated Coffee House, serving breakfast and light snacks. There is also a dry cleaning and laundry service provided. Safe deposit boxes at the hotel ensure the security of the guests' valuables. The hotel also organizes guided tours of the city on request. Other facilities include 24-hr reception desk, room service, Doctor-on-call (24 hours), Fax facility to mention a few. This hotel adds glamour and five-star treatment to the Hard Rock philosophy of fun, fashion and attitude.

name: Hotel Michael
description: Located on Sentosa Island, the hotel is a mere 10-minute drive from Singapore's Central Business District and is easily accessible via reliable, convenient and extremely affordable modes of transportation like buses, the MRT rail system, cabs and cars. Guests can take a leisurely stroll to VivoCity (about 10 minutes). Palawan Beach is about 10 minutes' walk away. Singapore Changi Airport is situated at a distance of approximately 35 km.Built in 2010, this 473-room designer hotel is one of the 6 hotels linked to the first Integrated Resort in Singapore. Its unique designer lifestyle features signature artworks and interior design by famed designer and architect Michael Graves including a collection of his favourite objects, from lamps to crockery and lounge chairs to carpet. Guests are welcomed to the air-conditioned property in a lobby with 24-hour reception and check-out service, currency exchange facilities and lift access. The establishment also comprises an auditorium, casino, games room, café, bar, pub, breakfast/dining room and conference facilities. Internet access and room service are additionally provided and for a fee guests may take advantage of the laundry service and car park.The main concept of the rooms is the unique lifestyle featuring signature artworks and interior design by Michael Graves, for instance, the circular shower, hand drawn murals by the designer and stunning mosaic-tile wall. Wireless Internet connection is available in the rooms with a fee. All rooms are en suite and equipped with a hairdryer, double bed, direct dial telephone, satellite/cable TV and radio. Furthermore, a safe, minibar, tea and coffee making facilities and individually regulated air conditioning feature as standard.

Ironing facilities and a hairdryer are provided upon request. For single rooms, bathrooms are located beside the rooms with 2 rooms sharing one common bathroom.

name: The Warehouse Hotel
description:
The Warehouse Hotel building itself was built in 1895 along the Singapore River as part of the Straits of Malacca trade route. At that time the area was a hotbed of secret societies - underground activity and liquor distilleries. Today while much of that history has disappeared one building is being meticulously restored as a modern 37-room boutique hotel focusing on heritage and local culture. name: Resorts World Sentosa Festive
description: Exuberant yet relaxing, Festive Hotel is ideal for vacationers seeking a welcoming and relaxing island stay. The Festive Hotel experience begins at the guest floor corridors, where giant orchid motifs on the carpet lead you to the fun and colorful chambers waiting behind the doors. Festive Hotel's relaxed setting in the heart of Resorts World at Sentosa makes it a popular choice for families. Each room is designed to accommodate five guests and there are heaps of family amusement options, as well as eateries situated just steps away from the hotel. Gold Award for: Best 10 in Asia in the Category of HAPA Signature Family & Recreational Resort Awarded by Hospitality Asia Platinum Awards (HAPA) Regional 2011-2013 Series Renovation Notice: Festive Hotel Deluxe Suites are going through renovation to serve you better from 18th July till further notice. Located in Singapore (Little India), 60's Hostel is minutes from Sri Vadapathira Kaliamman Temple and Leong San See Temple. This hostel is close to Chinatown Heritage Center and National Orchid Garden.

Make yourself at home in one of the 9 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include desks and irons/ironing boards, and housekeeping is provided daily.

description:
